scripts.docs-readme: npx typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --theme markdown --out docs/readme && npx concat-md --toc --decrease-title-levels --dir-name-as-title temp-docs > README.md && npx showdown makehtml -i README.md -o README.html && npx rimraf temp-docs
scripts.publish:patch: npm run build-tsc && npm version patch && npm publish --patch  --registry $NPM_SNAPSHOTS_REGISTRY
scripts.publish:minor: npm run build-tsc && npm version minor && npm publish --minor  --registry $NPM_STAGING_REGISTRY
scripts.publish:major: npm run build-tsc && npm version major && npm publish --major  --registry $NPM_RELEASES_REGISTRY
scripts.cover: npm run cover:unit && npm run cover:integration && npm run cover:report
